term.longtitle: IUPAC Gold Book - roughness factor (rugosity) of a surface
term.title: roughness factor

item.text: The ratio: fr = Ar/Ag is the real (true, actual) surface (interface) area and Ag is the geometric surface (interface) area.

sources.item: PAC, 1986, 58, 437. 'Interphases in systems of conducting phases (Recommendations 1985)' on page 439 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac198658030437)
